overview: In a world over-run by a drug, one man can remember a time before before the Fox. He writes his memories down in letters to his mother so they won't forget, pleading for her to come home and save him. On the streets he searches for the drug just like the rest of the world but he keeps forgetting, forgetting why he came home himself. Winning the Fox hunt is a psychedelic sci-fi that speculates on the rise of the legal drug trade in the form of the energy drink.
title: Winning the Fox Hunt
